entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High 13.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind southwest 70 km/h gusting to 100 diminishing to 50 gusting to 80 late this morning then to 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 13. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning then 30 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 12. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Monday 17 April 2023
